alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mississippi and northeastern New Madrid Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farrenburg, or near East Prairie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Big Oak Tree State Park around 525 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Towosahgy State Historic Site and Dorena. This includes Interstate 55 near Mile Marker 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
